structure.unit: ACQUISITION AND DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC PROJECTS THROUGH REVENUE BONDS

law.catch_line: Action challenging validity of ordinance or resolution authorizing bond issue.
law.text: Any action challenging the validity of any ordinance or resolution adopted by any governmental agency electing to issue bonds or notes under this chapter or any other chapter of the Kentucky Revised Statutes, shall be brought within thirty (30) days from the date on which notice of the adoption of said ordinance or resolution is published in accordance with KRS Chapter 424, and if such action challenging the validity of same is not brought within such time, such action shall be forever barred.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 260, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986.
